sources.title: Stoker, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Stoker (1932) NOAH BERRY
sources.description:
Stars: Monte Blue, Dorothy Burgess, Noah Beery 
Director: Chester M. Franklin

A man whose wife has deserted him winds up saving a beautiful girl from the clutches of a murderous bandit on a Nicaraguan coffee plantation.

sources.title: The Stoker (1932) Pre-Code, Drama | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A man whose wife has deserted him winds up saving a beautiful girl from the clutches of a murderous bandit on a Nicaraguan coffee plantation.

Director: Chester M. Franklin
